original: 會稽侯官人。與華佗、張仲景並稱為「建安三神醫」，後世將其視作神仙，列於東晉葛洪所編撰《神仙傳》中。另「杏林春暖」其典故由來，即源自於董奉。
text: Kuaiji Hou Guanren. Together with Hua Tuo and Zhang Zhongjing, they were called the "Three Genius Doctors of Jian'an." Later generations regarded them as gods and listed them in the "Biography of Immortals" compiled by Ge Hong in the Eastern Jin Dynasty. The origin of the allusion of "Xinglin Spring Warm" originated from Dong Feng.
